item.description:
As agreed on last meetup at Longfellow Place, we will also be meeting at Cafe Paradisio on Sunday, January 23rd at 4:00 PM in an effort to accomodate as many members as possible. So, we'll meet this Wednesday the 19th at 8:00 PM and this Sunday the 23rd at 4:00 PM at Cafe Paradisio. This arrangement might be temporary. We'll probably have to fine tune it in the future.

Salut a tous!

Frantz

group.name: The Boston French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston French Language January Meetup
